coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: Printed on the inside, a small tag reads 'MFD by DSG Costume Supply Co, Ltd'.
coreAttributes.name: kitty panties
coreAttributes.description: A pair of tie-up, very low riding panties with a pair of stylized cat ears attached to the front.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the panties up to [npc.her] groin and [npc.verb(tie)] it up on either side of [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the panties up to [npc2.namePos] groin and [npc.verb(tie)] it up on either side of [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the panties up to [npc2.namePos] groin so hard it practically gives [npc2.her] a wedgie and [npc.verb(tie)] it up on either side of [npc2.namePos] waist as tightly as possible.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc.her] panties and [npc.verb(let)] them fall from [npc.her] waist.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc2.namePos] panties and [npc.verb(let)] them fall from [npc2.her] waist.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shift)] [npc.her] panties back into place, covering [npc.her] groin.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shift)] [npc2.namePos] panties back into place, covering [npc2.her] groin.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(snap)] [npc2.namePos] panties back into place, covering [npc2.her] groin.
